thread.title: Tracey

author: Tracey
title: Tracey
text:
Fantastic company to deal with. Website is superb. Superb email correspondence speedy dispatch and delivery. Item as described with gorgeous packaging. Loved the style tips where someone has tried on the garment to check the fit and styling before selling it. Will definitely be purchasing from this Company again.
Loved it, fantastic customer experience. Try them you won't be disappointed. If only all purchases could be like this.
